protein.specific_function: Cleaves proteins, imported into the mitochondrion, to their mature size

go_class.description: peptidase activity, acting on l-amino acid peptides

reference.reference_text: Chew A, Buck EA, Peretz S, Sirugo G, Rinaldo P, Isaya G: Cloning, expression, and chromosomal assignment of the human mitochondrial intermediate peptidase gene (MIPEP). Genomics. 1997 Mar 15;40(3):493-6.
